data.what_is:
Real-Time Interaction Automation & Management Platform driven by AI.
Synerise connects modern data collection, processing methods and analytics with AI-driven business scenario execution. 

Synerise uses AI to completely change the modern approach to data management. A comprehensive ecosystem provides the ability to collect information about end customers from multiple sources, analyze this data and draw conclusions on the optimization of business processes: all in real-time (milliseconds). Synerise offers its own unique, fast-acting database, ready-made machine learning-based business solutions and an open platform that can be adapted to each of your needs.

Synerise is based on three technology pillars:
1. Terrarium Data Engine
Our   schema-less,   column   &   row-oriented   database   is   a   scalable,   ultra-fast   tool   that simultaneously processes data-heavy executing analytics and behavioral data to create various business scenarios in real-time. Terrarium is an "all in one" DB project that resolves the challenges no  other  available  tool  can  solve.  With  Terrarium  we  didn't  need  to  string  together  several independent third-party technologies, which would result in both higher system complexity and costs. Terrarium enables effective and simultaneous executions of analytical / column and row queries.

2. Cleora.ai
Cleora.ai is one of the fastest graph embedding algorithms in existence. It is an essential element for  systems  operating  on  data  in  the  form  of  a  network  of  connected  nodes.  These  are recommendation systems, systems that predict the existence of connections between users in social  media  (e.g  like  /  follow). Cleora  underpins  some  parts  of  our  ecosystem  and  we continuously implement solutions based on it in many companies.

3.Synerise platform
Synerise platform collects unique knowledge about each user from multiple sources and creates a  complete  360-degree  customer  profile,  updated  in  real-time. Automate campaigns  and personalize communication via e-mail, SMS, web push and mobile notifications using the intuitive 'drag & drop' editor and ready-to-use templates. Synerise also offers the ability to create various types  of  analyses, ranging from campaign results, by creating indicators with custom KPIs, to creating your own custom dash boards.

The company has invested extensively in its own intellectual property and employing top AI researchers and data scientists to ensure that its AI Growth Ecosystem is free of vendor locks and fully scalable. The goal is to meet the requirements of international enterprises on the leading edge of innovation and digital transformation.

We know the joy of winning
The development of Synerisein the field of artificial intelligence is confirmed by winning numerous awards (podiums) at international AI competitions alongside such technology giants as Google Deep Mind, Baidu, Nvidiaor Layer6.

* #17 Europe's Fastest Growing Technology Sector Company according to Financial Times & statista.com 
* Microsoft Awards 2017-2019 Winner
* Winner at Rakuten Data Challenge 2020, 1st place
* Winner at ACM WSDM Booking.com Data Challenge 2021, 2nd place
* Winner at ACM KDD Cup OGB-LSC 2021, 3rd place
* Winner at ACM RecSys Twitter Challenge 2021, 2nd place

Born in the cloud  and raised by data
data.product_description: The Synerise AI-based Ecosystem leverages real-time data to deliver valuable insights into market opportunities, potential for growth and process efficiency while delivering a 360-degree customer view.

initial_reviews.review_title: Robust and advanced data collection and analytics driven by AI
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
The platform provides accurate results as AI is greatly used as it has enough knowledge about what is being asked. Further, Synerise responds faster and this saves on time. The platform can collect customer behavioral data which they scrutinize to produce a quality report and customer assistance required. The platform provides a lot of features like robust analytics tools, and personalization as it is a multiskilled platform. Synerise makes the possibility to answe the FAQs as it is integrated with answers for that.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
The platform is time-consuming as many dashboard is created from the beginning hence using a lot of time. Besides, Synerise is rapidly developing; hence, you must have the best collected and maintained database.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerise provides proper analytics and results as it helps to get customers' trends and data. Further, the use of AI helps in navigating reports and personalized details are well shared. The conjecturing analytics open a field not just to understand but to antedate customer behavior. The program encourages users to highly engage the company support and this makes them get customized marketing messages.

initial_reviews.review_title: Quality, Sustainable and Intelligent Behavior Analytical Tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
Synerise has suitable features that makes it practical to collect behavioral data from customers and they are analyzed to deliver quality report.
The integration with AI systems, which gives accurate results is also a merit.
The simplified interpretation from the software is also an exciting feature that delivers an easy to understand report. The implementation of this tool helps in managing the robust business growth through accurate data analytics.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
The determination with this platform is remarkable, where trends and behaviors from customers are well captured, and the right results shared. Besides, the updates and use of AI makes the process flawless.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
The program helps in acquiring customer trends and data, which conducts proper analytics and results shared. Further, there is the use of AI, where personalized details are well shared and report navigated. The introduction of proper marketing streams is also a fundamental scope that brings more customer on board.

initial_reviews.review_title: Empowering Next-Level Personalization Through Synerise's AI-Powered Predictions
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
Synerise shines with its AI-driven predictive insights. This feature elevates the realm of individualized personalization to new heights. Leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, Synerise doesn't just interpret but forecasts user behaviors, empowering businesses to take a step ahead, not just catch up.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
Synerise is growing really fast and is one of the most innovative AI Company in Europe. To take the best from the platform you need to have a well collected and mantained database/datalake that sometimes it takes time. But the outcome are rellay impressive in terms of personalization and predictive insights.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Today, companies are driven by data. However, it's essential to extract value from this data and transition to being AI-driven. Companies should be proactive, not reactive, by anticipating user behavior rather than responding after events have occurred. Thus, the primary goal that Synerise enables us to achieve is predictiveness.
The second key aspect is integration. Large companies possess significant infrastructures, such as CDP, ERP, and CRM. Synerise is easily integrable and helps us overcome one of the most significant barriers to adoption.

initial_reviews.review_title: Deficency of Data Analysis and Automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
Their platform not excels in analysis providing valuable strategic insights through its Basemodel feature. The level of personalization and predictive insights it provides is not good. There is room for improvement in the implementation phase.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
When it comes to integrating insights from third party software Synerise requires some work, which can pose limitations for businesses. Their pricing structure not be suitable for all budgets potentially straining brands and businesses.  Synerise empowers marketing campaigns some customers find that its focus on data analysis and automation lacks the touch they prefer.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerises intuitive platform is unable to solve our businesss problems with data analysis and segmentation. By simplifying our marketing campaigns and targeting the customers at the time causes problems. This process is too much time taking.

initial_reviews.review_title: Unlocking the Future of One-to-One Personalization with Synerise's Predictive Analytics
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
The standout feature of Synerise is its predictive behavioral analysis. This capability is a game-changer for one-to-one personalization. Using machine learning, Synerise not only analyzes but predicts customer interests, allowing businesses to be proactive rather than just reactive.

In a nutshell, it's not just about understanding past customer behavior; it's about foreseeing future actions. This predictive edge makes Synerise invaluable for personalized marketing strategies.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
While Synerise excels in predictive behavioral analysis and offers strategic insights through its Basemodel feature, there's room for improvement in the implementation phase. Specifically, the platform generates highly strategic and operational suggestions but falls short when it comes to seamless integration with some third-party software. This means that businesses often find themselves in a position where they have to manually implement these insights, which can be time-consuming and may require additional resources.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerise is a game-changer when it comes to customer personalization and data-driven decision-making. Its predictive analytics allow you to not just understand but anticipate customer behavior, giving you a competitive edge. While it's true that some manual work may be needed for implementing insights with certain third-party software, the strategic value Synerise brings to the table far outweighs this limitation. Overall, it's a powerful tool for any business looking to elevate their customer engagement and make smarter, data-backed decisions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation elevated to the next level
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
What I like about Synerise is that when a customer asks me if something is possible, practically always the answer is yes. You just have to find a way to do it. Some of the tools on the market have certain limitations, here if one appears, the Synerise team tries to either find a workaround for it or address it in a road map.

The technical team supporting partners in their daily work is also great.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
The need to build multiple dashboards from scratch. On the one hand, this gives freedom and flexibility, on the other hand, it can be time-consuming.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
- AI driven personalizaton,
- Segmentation,

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
Synerise is a versatile platform, and what stands out the most are its exceptional customer segmentation capabilities. It offers a wide range of features, including segmentation, personalization, multi-channel marketing automation, and robust analytics tools.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
However, it's worth noting that navigating certain advanced features within Synerise can be challenging, and the complexity of the platform might be a potential drawback for users who are new to it or have limited technical experience.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerise effectively addresses the critical issue of data segmentation. By aggregating customer data from various sources, the platform empowers users to create highly targeted and personalized marketing messages. This, in turn, results in more efficient and effective marketing campaigns, ultimately driving better engagement and conversion rates.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
It is one of the most robust CDPs for marketers looking to leverage the power of AI to elevate their marketing activities to the next level and deliver a seamless and personalized experience to the end customer.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
"Dislike" would be a harsh word to be used here; however, their lack of local data hosting in the MENA is a challenge considering the sweeping changes to the data laws across the GCC. However, they do provide custom-tailored solutions to customers when required to ensure they are in line with the required regulations.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
In a space dominated by tech giants with legacy products and rigid commercial structure, Synerise provides a robust solution that is agile to ensure brands and businesses can adopt the platform at an early stage with complete access to all functionality with the ability to scale up as they grow and not hurt their wallets due to the flexible pricing model.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Synerise?
review_question_answers.answer: It is one of the most robust CDPs for marketers looking to leverage the power of AI to elevate their marketing activities to the next level and deliver a seamless and personalized experience to the end customer.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Synerise?
review_question_answers.answer: "Dislike" would be a harsh word to be used here; however, their lack of local data hosting in the MENA is a challenge considering the sweeping changes to the data laws across the GCC. However, they do provide custom-tailored solutions to customers when required to ensure they are in line with the required regulations.

initial_reviews.review_title: I don't know any other platform that develops in such a reactive way
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
I worked with Synerise from the client and agency level. In both cases, the cooperation was very partnership-based. Each addressed problem or suggestion for the development of the platform met with a very quick analysis and solution was provided.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
This is both a plus and a minus, because a lot of space for low-code solutions, gives a lot of personalization possibilities, but you need to have these skills.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
- CRO
- Personalized Communication
- Analysis

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Today, companies are driven by data. However, it's essential to extract value from this data and transition to being AI-driven. Companies should be proactive, not reactive, by anticipating user behavior rather than responding after events have occurred. Thus, the primary goal that Synerise enables us to achieve is predictiveness.
The second key aspect is integration. Large companies possess significant infrastructures, such as CDP, ERP, and CRM. Synerise is easily integrable and helps us overcome one of the most significant barriers to adoption.

all_reviews.review_title: Unlocking the Future of One-to-One Personalization with Synerise's Predictive Analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
The standout feature of Synerise is its predictive behavioral analysis. This capability is a game-changer for one-to-one personalization. Using machine learning, Synerise not only analyzes but predicts customer interests, allowing businesses to be proactive rather than just reactive.

In a nutshell, it's not just about understanding past customer behavior; it's about foreseeing future actions. This predictive edge makes Synerise invaluable for personalized marketing strategies.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
While Synerise excels in predictive behavioral analysis and offers strategic insights through its Basemodel feature, there's room for improvement in the implementation phase. Specifically, the platform generates highly strategic and operational suggestions but falls short when it comes to seamless integration with some third-party software. This means that businesses often find themselves in a position where they have to manually implement these insights, which can be time-consuming and may require additional resources.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerise is a game-changer when it comes to customer personalization and data-driven decision-making. Its predictive analytics allow you to not just understand but anticipate customer behavior, giving you a competitive edge. While it's true that some manual work may be needed for implementing insights with certain third-party software, the strategic value Synerise brings to the table far outweighs this limitation. Overall, it's a powerful tool for any business looking to elevate their customer engagement and make smarter, data-backed decisions.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation elevated to the next level
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
What I like about Synerise is that when a customer asks me if something is possible, practically always the answer is yes. You just have to find a way to do it. Some of the tools on the market have certain limitations, here if one appears, the Synerise team tries to either find a workaround for it or address it in a road map.

The technical team supporting partners in their daily work is also great.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
The need to build multiple dashboards from scratch. On the one hand, this gives freedom and flexibility, on the other hand, it can be time-consuming.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
- AI driven personalizaton,
- Segmentation,

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
Synerise is a versatile platform, and what stands out the most are its exceptional customer segmentation capabilities. It offers a wide range of features, including segmentation, personalization, multi-channel marketing automation, and robust analytics tools.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
However, it's worth noting that navigating certain advanced features within Synerise can be challenging, and the complexity of the platform might be a potential drawback for users who are new to it or have limited technical experience.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
Synerise effectively addresses the critical issue of data segmentation. By aggregating customer data from various sources, the platform empowers users to create highly targeted and personalized marketing messages. This, in turn, results in more efficient and effective marketing campaigns, ultimately driving better engagement and conversion rates.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Synerise?
It is one of the most robust CDPs for marketers looking to leverage the power of AI to elevate their marketing activities to the next level and deliver a seamless and personalized experience to the end customer.

What do you dislike about Synerise?
"Dislike" would be a harsh word to be used here; however, their lack of local data hosting in the MENA is a challenge considering the sweeping changes to the data laws across the GCC. However, they do provide custom-tailored solutions to customers when required to ensure they are in line with the required regulations.

What problems is Synerise solving and how is that benefiting you?
In a space dominated by tech giants with legacy products and rigid commercial structure, Synerise provides a robust solution that is agile to ensure brands and businesses can adopt the platform at an early stage with complete access to all functionality with the ability to scale up as they grow and not hurt their wallets due to the flexible pricing model.
